items.title: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT
items.content: Introducing Lockdown Mode and Elevated Risk labels in ChatGPT to help organizations defend against prompt injection and AI-driven data exfiltration.
key_points: Lockdown Mode introduced to defend against prompt injection.
Elevated Risk labels introduced to help defend against AI-driven data exfiltration.

items.title: OpenClaw
items.content: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant that connects your messaging apps to local AI coding agents, all running on your own device.
key_points: OpenClaw is a personal AI assistant.
Connects messaging apps to local AI coding agents.
